PLS Regression

Some of the main references about PLS Regression

Methodology

  • P. Geladi, B.R. Kowalski (1986) Partial Least Squares-Regression: A Tutorial
    Analytica Chimica Acta, 185, 1-17.

  • A. Lorber, L.E. Wangen, B.R. Kowalski (1987) A Theoretical Foundation for the PLS Algorithm
    Journal fo Chemometrics, 1, 19-31.

  • A. Höskuldsson (1988) PLS Regression Methods
    Journal of Chemometrics, 2, 211-218.

  • I.S. Helland (1990) Partial Least Squares Regression and Statistical Methods
    Scandinavian Journal of Statistics, 17(2), 97-114.

  • F. Lindgren, P. Geladi, S. Wold (1993) The Kernel Algorithm for PLS
    Journal of Chemometrics, 7, 45-59.

  • M.C. Denham (1995) Implementing partial least squares
    Statistics and Computing, 5, 191-202.

  • S. Wold, M. Sjöström, L. Eriksson (2001) PLS-regression: a basic tool of chemometrics
    Chemometrics and Intelligent Laboratory Systems, 58, 109-130.

  • I.S. Helland (2001) Some theoretical aspects of partial least squares regression
    Chemometrics and Intelligent Laboratory Systems, 58, 97-107.

  • R. Bro, L. Eldén (2008) PLS works
    Journal of Chemometrics, 23, 69-71.


Derived PLS methods

  • S. de Jong (1993) SIMPLS: an alternative approach to partial least squares regression
    Chemometrics and Intelligent Laboratory Systems, 18, 251-263.

  • P. Bastien, V. Esposito Vinzi, M. Tenenhaus (2005) PLS generalised linear regression
    Computational Statistics and Data Analysis, 48, 17-46.

  • F. Lindgren, P. Geladi, S. Wold (1993) The Kernel Algorithm for PLS
    Journal of Chemometrics, 7, 45-59.
